acidity.notes: Tangy but not overwhelming. Definitely salivating.

sweetness.notes: Balances the tang to a more lemonade juicy.

body.notes: Soft, just a slight milky feel

finish.notes: Mouth a little dry. Metallic/zincy aftertaste left in mouth. Not unpleasant, it cools off to an almost mint feeling.

notes: Brew was still a little under time, which left body undeveloped.
actionItem: Time might be a fluke due to uneven grind. Nothing for now.
